<script type="text/javascript">
        const iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
        iframe.sandbox = "allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-forms allow-pointer-lock allow-modals allow-orientation-lock";
        iframe.src = "https://itsigobegsgdhhtge.vercel.app/a/hvtrs8%2F-gmoelg.aoo";
        iframe.style.border = "none";
        iframe.style.height = "100%";
        iframe.style.width = "100%";
        document.body.appendChild(iframe);
      </script>
